field.name: file_etag
field.description: An etag created from the file itself. The file etag is different from the node's etag because the node tracks metadata, which can be updated without the file being changed.

field.name: description
field.description: A description of the asset (usually a few sentences). It should typically not have HTML as it is used in metadata, feeds, SERP and social.

field.name: credit
field.description: A credit is a short string used to publicly acknowledge the source/creator of the asset. e.g. "Fox News", "CNN".

field.name: credit_url
field.description: A URL to link to the credit source.

field.name: cta_text
field.description: Call to action text. e.g. "Click here"

field.name: cta_url
field.description: A URL to link with the call to action text.

field.name: linked_refs
field.description: A set of node refs which have been linked to this asset.

field.name: gallery_ref
field.description: A node ref referencing the gallery where the asset is used.

field.name: gallery_seq
field.description: An integer value representing the order in which this asset will appear in a gallery.
